QuestData.Title: Something Stolen
QuestData.Description: Everyone's going to want to dress their best for this, and finery is in short supply in the Highlands.$B$BI understand that those goblin wretches off the coast use the finest silk for repairing their zeppelin air envelopes. A waste!$B$BFind a zeppelin flying back and forth between Dragonmaw Port and the Krazzworks, and liberate some silk from the cargo hold in the lower decks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a bolt of Fine Dark Cloth.
QuestData.CompletionText: How did the air raid go?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, aye! Kilts for the gents, gowns for the bridesmaids.$B$BJust don't tell the ladies they're wearing clothes fit for a blimp.
